description: This file implements a Next.js page component and related subcomponents for tracking a food delivery order in a restaurant-finder and delivery-tracker app. It loads order details via API, subscribes to WebSocket updates for real-time status, and renders order timeline, map placeholder, and order summary.

classes.name: OrderStatusTimeline
classes.description: Component that displays a vertical timeline of order status steps, highlighting current status, and shows optional time placed at info.

classes.name: LiveMapPlaceholder
classes.description: Component rendering a placeholder block for live delivery map, showing pickup and dropoff info.

methods.name: OrderTrackingPage
methods.description: Main page component for tracking order details and status, manages loading, errors, WebSocket subscriptions, and renders status timeline, map placeholder, and order summary.

methods.name: normalizeStatus
methods.description: Utility function to normalize backend order status strings to predefined status union.
